about_the_game: We are excited to release our DEMO for the Guardians. The DEMO will not contain any spoilers and is to focused on the core gameplay of what to expect in the main game. The DEMO is a working progress, so if you see any bugs/issues, please let us know in the discussion page.
detailed_description: We are excited to release our DEMO for the Guardians. The DEMO will not contain any spoilers and is to focused on the core gameplay of what to expect in the main game. The DEMO is a working progress, so if you see any bugs/issues, please let us know in the discussion page.
name: THE GUARDIANS Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: This DEMO will not contain any spoilers and is to focused on the core gameplay of what to expect in the main game.
supported_languages:
English*, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
